wordGroup: sense of humor 幽默感，幽默
good humor n. 高兴；心情好
black humor 黑色幽默（一种病态或异乎寻常的幽默）
aqueous humor 房水；水状液；眼房水
gallows humor 充满怨恨的幽默；化解严重场面或僵局的幽默（等于gallows humour）
ill humor n. 怒气；不悦

sentences.en: The movie mixes broad humor with romance.
sentences.cn: 那部电影把粗俗幽默和浪漫故事结合在一起。

sentences.en: It's filled with a really fun sense of humor.
sentences.cn: 它充满了真正有趣的幽默感。

sentences.en: He has found that humor is a double-edged sword.
sentences.cn: 他发现幽默是一把双刃剑。
